briefdescription.para: Initialize the security service. This function should only be called once upon system initialization.
Initialize the random number service. This function should only be called once upon system initialization.
Initialize the AES service. This function should only be called once upon system initialization.
Initialize the AES (reverse) service. This function should only be called once upon system initialization.
Called to initialize CMAC security. This function should only be called once upon system initialization.
Called to initialize CCM security.
Called to initialize ECC security. This function should only be called once upon system initialization.

sectiondef.header: Security AES, CMAC and CCM Functions

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pPlaintext, wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: SecAes

briefdescription.para: Execute an AES calculation. When the calculation completes, a WSF message will be sent to the specified handler. This function returns a token value that the client can use to match calls to this function with messages.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pPlaintext, wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: SecAesRev

briefdescription.para: Execute an AES calculation. When the calculation completes, a WSF message will be sent to the specified handler. This function returns a token value that the client can use to match calls to this function with messages. Note this version reverses the key and plaintext bytes.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pPlaintext, uint16_t textLen, wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: SecCmac

briefdescription.para: Execute the CMAC algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: Plain text buffer - buffer must persist until secCmacMsg_t callback.
Optional parameter sent to client's WSF handler.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pNonce, uint8_t *pPlainText, uint16_t textLen, uint8_t *pClear, uint16_t clearLen, uint8_t micLen, uint8_t *pResult, wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: SecCcmEnc

briefdescription.para: Execute the CCM-Mode encryption algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to additional, unencrypted authentication text.
Size of MIC in bytes (4, 8 or 16).
Buffer to hold result (returned in complete event).
Task handler ID to receive complete event.
Optional parameter passed in complete event.

memberdef.argsstring: (const uint8_t *pKey, uint8_t *pNonce, uint8_t *pCypherText, uint16_t textLen, uint8_t *pClear, uint16_t clearLen, uint8_t *pMic, uint8_t micLen, uint8_t *pResult, wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: SecCcmDec

briefdescription.para: Execute the CCM-Mode verify and decrypt algorithm.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to additional, unencrypted authentication text.
Size of MIC in bytes (4, 8 or 16).
Buffer to hold result (returned in complete event).
Task handler ID to receive complete event.
Optional parameter passed in complete event.

briefdescription.para: Generate an ECC key.

parameterdescription.para: Optional parameter sent to client's WSF handler.

memberdef.argsstring: (secEccKey_t *pKey, wsfHandlerId_t handlerId, uint16_t param, uint8_t event)
memberdef.name: SecEccGenSharedSecret

briefdescription.para: Generate an ECC key.

parameterdescription.para: Optional parameter sent to client's WSF handler.

briefdescription.para: This function returns up to 16 bytes of random data to a buffer provided by the client.
CMAC algorithm key length.
CMAC algorithm key length.
CMAC algorithm result length.
